description: This table extracts information about Hospice Item Set (HIS) data set responses as obtained from CMS through validation files.

columns.name: DATASET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the data set record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: HIS_RESP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The response status of an individual dataset submission. This could be "Accepted" or "Rejected". 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accepted


Rejected

columns.name: HIS_VALD_MRK_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when a dataset submission response status is changed.

columns.name: HIS_RES_MRK_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user record associated with an update to the status of a dataset submission. If the batch process updated the submission status, this user ID is stored as ".

columns.name: HIS_RESP_HNO_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of a note associated with the data set.
